text: فما استطعوا۟ من قيام وما كانوا۟ منتصرين

translations.translation: They could not stand upright and they were not helped.
And neither stand up nor defend themselves.
They were unable even to stand up or protect themselves.
They were unable to stand up, nor were they helped.
So they were neither able to stand up, nor were they able to take revenge.
Then they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
So they were not able to rise up, nor could they defend themselves-
and they were not able to stand upright, and were not helped.
And they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
they could not stand up again, nor could they defend themselves.
So they were not able to stand, nor could they help themselves.
So they were neither able to rise up, nor to come to one another’s aid.
Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.
Then they were unable to rise up, nor could they help themselves.
they could neither stand up straight, nor were they helped.
They could not rise up, nor could they find help.
And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
[51:45] So they were unable to rise up, they could not get up upon the sending down of the chastisement, nor were they victors, over the One Who destroyed them.

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِنْ قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنْتَصِرِينَ (45(وقوله : { وما كانوا منتصرين } أي لم ينصرهم ناصر حتى يكونوا منتصرين لأن انتصر مطاوع نصر ، أي ما نصرهم أحد فانتصروا .

translations.translation: (And they were unable to rise up) following Allah's chastisement, (nor could they help themselves) nor could their bodies avert the chastisement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
بل { فَمَا ٱسْتَطَاعُواْ } وما قدروا { مِن قِيَامٍ } نهوض
 وحركة عن أمكنتهم التي كانوا فيها عند ظهورها { وَ } بالجملة: { مَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ } [الذاريات: 45] ممتنعين من عذابنا منتقمين منا


{ وَ } مثل ما أهكلنا المذكورين
